name: Chabanais Baby Crib
description: The Chabanais Baby Crib by Kifu Paris is the ultimate luxury piece for your child's bedroom. Inspired by the birth of her first child, Kifu Augousti designed this piece to embrace the whimsical world of a child. The piece is inlaid in cream shagreen with smokey white quartz and bronze-patina brass details. The mattress is included with the piece and includes three drawers for practical use. Other variations available.Currently made to order 8-10 weeksDesign SKU Reference KCRB03The dimensions of this piece are 129 x 65 x 90 cmCustom sizing/finishing available on request.All shagreen pieces are hand-dyed by artisans. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines
